h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Golden Loong Staff Location
content: The Golden Loong Staff can be found in Chapter 3 - The New West upon defeating Cyan Loong. This is an optional boss on Turtle Island which requires the Loong Scales.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Golden_Loong_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Golden Loong Staff', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Golden Loong Staff Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Golden Loong Staff can be found in Chapter 3 - The New West upon defeating Cyan Loong. This is an optional boss on Turtle Island which requires the Loong Scales.
